title: Bound by Wreckage
description: Wrecked. Damaged. Bound.Carsyn Devero is in too deep. The skeletons in her closet come out daily to remind her of the past she can't escape. Broken and beaten, there is no out. Lennox "Nox" Cruz can't turn his back. No matter the collateral damage, he can't walk away from her. He simply isn't that kind of man.A second chance encounter brings a boy who is now a man back into her world. As much as she knows she needs to walk away for everyone's safety, Nox won't let her.She's stuck and doesn't want to drag him down into her storm. He's relentless and refuses to let her fall.They're bound by the wreckage, only holding onto hope no one else will go down with them. Even with the Ravage MC at their backs, sometimes staying afloat isnâ€™t in the cards. ** Bound by Wreckage (Bound #6) (Ravage MC #11) is a full-length standalone novel. **
author: Ryan Michele
